name: KeyNest - Smart Key Exchange
slogan: Smart key management solutions for Airbnb hosts and the property industry
description:
KeyNest provides a full key-management service for Airbnb hosts, property management companies and estate agencies. 

With offices in London, Paris and New York, KeyNest serves thousands of clients across 13 countries.

team.title: Co Founder
team.name: Marc Figueras
team.bioHtml: Co founder @KeyNest - Smart Key Exchange • Background in private equity • Worked @CIL @Zidisha.

team.name: Jalal Naqvi
team.bioHtml: Always keep your eyes open, Keep watching. Because whatever you see can inspire you.

team.title: Country Manager Spain
team.name: Soundra Gautreaux
team.bioHtml: Worked at Marsh & Parsons, EF Education First. Sales and Events Management. Fluent in Spanish, French and English. Went to Hult International Business School.

jobs.title: Business Development Associate (New York)
jobs.description:
KeyNest is a fast-growing network of shops where Airbnb hosts and Property Managers can securely store their keys so that their new tenants / guests / cleaners / contractors can pick them up whenever is convenient for them. We are a global partner of Airbnb and have checked-in more than 1,000,000 guests.

We’re looking for a Business Development Associate to grow our network of KeyNest stores across North America. This is a 4-6-month paid internship based in downtown New York City.

**The role**

* Recruit new locations to join the KeyNest partner program, in person and over the phone
* Liaise with our customers to find the best suitable partner 
* Train and/or mystery shop our partner locations where required
* Demonstrate an in-depth knowledge of our product offering to customers

**Who we are looking for**

* Excellent communication and outgoing personality
* Available to travel extensively in and around New York and occasionally outside
* Pro-active, self-motivated and work well in a team environment style
* Excellent English, knowledge of other languages is a plus
* Experience as an Airbnb host / guest is a plus
* Available for 4 months minimum

**What we offer**

* Unique chance to make your mark in a well-funded, dynamic & fast-growing start-up shaking up the sharing economy
* Unlimited support from our London head office 
* Working closely with our North American manager
* Allowance of $230 / week paid every Friday; $1,000 / month
* Possibility to be hired full-time or to continue working remotely whilst at university
* Downtown Manhattan office with free drinks and snacks

How to apply

If you want to join the KeyNest team, please send us your resume and cover letter. We look forward to meeting you.

	[KeyNest - Smart Key Exchange](https://keynest.com)

jobs.title: Business Expansion Assistant (Madrid/Barcelona/Malaga)
jobs.description:
**Business Expansion Representative (Madrid/Barcelona/Malaga)
**

KeyNest is a smart key exchange solution and global Airbnb HostAssist partner that enables hosts, estate agents, short and long term rental managers and busy urban residents to securely share their existing keys with guests, friends, cleaners and other authorised users.
With over 2000 locations across the UK, France, Italy, Ireland, Portugal and most recently Spain, we are now looking for an energetic Business Expansion Representative to grow our network of stores across Spain on freelance basis.
This is a perfect role for someone looking for a part-time role, who is looking to start a career in Sales and wants to gain exposure to a dynamic and fast growing startup. 

**The role**

* Establishing partnerships with local stores to make them part of our KeyNest network: This consists of identifying potential stores in specific areas, arrange business meetings with prospective partners and recruiting in person and over the phone where possible.
* Training of new partner shops: Demonstrate an in-depth understanding of how the system works in order to train our new partner stores, and guarantee exceptional service to our clients.
* “Surprise visits” to our partner shops: Visit current stores in our network every now and then to ensure good practice is taking place.
* Provide excellent customer service to our customers.

**Who we are looking for**

* An energetic, self-motivated and proactive individual, eager to add and take part in our young start-up. 
* Available to dedicate between 20-25 hours a week on recruitment. 
* Fluency in Spanish is mandatory. 
* Available to travel extensively in and around the city and occasionally outside. 
* Excellent communication and outgoing personality
* Relevant experience (particularly within a scaling business and/or sales role)

**What we offer:**
 
* Achievable daily commission of €50 a day! 
* Bonus for every new partner signed to our network of stores €€.
* Possibility to be hired full-time or to continue working remotely whilst at university.
* Unique chance to make your mark in a dynamic and very fast-growing company shaking up the sharing economy

If you want to join the KeyNest team, please get in touch. We look forward to meeting you.

[KeyNest - Smart Key Exchange](https://keynest.com/es/inicio)

jobs.title: Business development, customer care and partner operations internship
jobs.description:
KeyNest is an award-winning travel tech startup whose mission is to facilitate Airbnb key handovers worldwide. The KeyNest network is made of thousands of local shops across the world, where Airbnb hosts and property managers can securely store their keys, so that their new tenants/guests/cleaners/contractors can pick them up whenever is convenient.

As a global partner of Airbnb, we have checked in more than 750,000 guests across 500 cities on three continents. Our team is the heart of soul of this business and its continued global expansion. We’re looking for a Business Development Associate to grow our network of KeyNest Stores. This is a paid 4-6-month internship based in London.

The role

•	Recruit new Stores to join the KeyNest partner programme, in person and over the phone
•	Liaise with our customers to find the best suitable partner 
•	Train and/or mystery shop our partner Stores where required
•	Demonstrate an in-depth knowledge of our product offering to customers

Who we are looking for

•	Excellent communication and outgoing personality
•	Available to travel extensively in and around London and occasionally outside
•	Fluency in French, Spanish, German or Italian is a strong plus.
•	Pro-active, self-motivated and work well in a team environment style
•	Excellent English, knowledge of other languages a plus
•	Experience as an Airbnb host / guest is a plus
•	Available for 4 months minimum

What we offer

•	Allowance of £150 / week paid every Friday
•	Possibility to be hired full-time or to continue working remotely whilst at university
•	Unique chance to make your mark in a dynamic and very fast-growing company shaking up the sharing economy
If you want to join the KeyNest team, please get in touch – we look forward to meeting you.

jobs.title: Italy Expansion Manager
jobs.description:
KeyNest is an award-winning travel tech startup whose mission is to facilitate Airbnb key handovers worldwide. The KeyNest network is made of thousands of local shops across the world, where Airbnb hosts and property managers can securely store their keys, so that their new tenants/guests/cleaners/contractors can pick them up whenever is convenient.

As a global partner of Airbnb, we have checked in more than 750,000 guests across 500 cities on three continents. Our team is the heart of soul of this business and its continued global expansion. We’re looking for a highly committed team-player to expand our presence in Italy and build a team as sales grow. This is a great role for a stellar salesperson or business development executive looking to make their mark at one of the fastest growing travel start-ups.

**The role**

* Source and engage with potential customers (short-term rental property managers)
* Generate leads through networking, partnerships, events, and referrals
* Maintain relationships with existing customers and offer support as needed
* Expand our network of stores in Italy based on customer requests
* Manage freelancers/employees as the team grows

**Who we are looking for**

* Natural salesperson who is good at closing deals
* Proactive, self-motivated and focused on results
* An established network in the short-term rental industry will be highly advantageous
* Not afraid to lead a team and take responsibility for the team’s performance
* Perfect written and spoken Italian + excellent English
* Experience in the property sector is a plus
* Based in London, Rome or Milan, willing to travel

**What we offer**

* Crucial role in a funded, dynamic & fast-growing start-up shaking up the sharing economy
* Unlimited support from London Head Office and our two founders
* Competitive salary based on relevant experience
* Reimbursement for work-related travel and expenses

If you want to join the KeyNest team, please get in touch. We look forward to meeting you.

[KeyNest - Smart Key Exchange](https://keynest.com)
